question: A XOR B
hint: It is equivalent to... (A OR B) not (A AND B)

question: A NOR B
hint: It is equivalent to... not (A OR B)

question: A XNOR B
hint: It is equivalent to... not (A XOR B)

question: A → B
hint: It is equivalent to... not A OR B

question: B → A
hint: It is equivalent to... not B OR A

question: A NAND B
hint: It is equivalent to... not (A AND B)

question: Well Done!! Go to the next level...
